xx.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all the Fishy Business challenges:
  • Bigger Fish
  • Shark From Above
  • Fish Attack!
  • Aquatic Saviour
  • The Little Merman
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Eliminate the two aquarium guards with a shark.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Throw 3 fish into the aquariums under the floor.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Eliminate Florida Man with the bigger fish.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Knock out Robert Knox with a fish.
  • Knock out Sierra Knox with a fish.

en.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all the Fishy Business challenges:
  • Bigger Fish
  • Shark from Above
  • Fish Attack!
  • Aquatic Savior
  • The Little Merman
en.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Eliminate the two aquarium guards with a shark.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Throw 3 fish into the aquariums under the floor.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Eliminate Florida Man with the bigger fish.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Knock out Robert Knox with a fish.
  • Knock out Sierra Knox with a fish.

fr.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Terminez tous les défis de Gang de requins :
  • Plus gros poisson
  • Le requin venu d'en haut
  • Attaque de poisson !
  • Sauveur aquatique
  • Le petit triton
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Éliminez les deux gardes de l'aquarium avec un requin.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Lancez 3 poissons dans les aquariums sous le sol.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Éliminez Florida Man avec le plus gros poisson.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Assommez Robert Knox avec un poisson.
  • Assommez Sierra Knox avec un poisson.

it.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa tutte le sfide "Qualcosa che puzza":
  • Il pesce più grosso
  • Squalo all'improvviso
  • Attacco dei pesci!
  • Salvatore acquatico
  • Il sirenetto
it.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Elimina le due guardie dell'acquario con uno squalo.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Lancia 3 pesci negli acquari sotto il pavimento.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Elimina Florida Man con il pesce più grosso.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Metti K.O. Robert Knox con un pesce.
  • Metti K.O. Sierra Knox con un pesce.

de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Schließen Sie alle „Das riecht nach Fisch“-Herausforderungen ab:
  • Hai im Karpfenteich
  • Kommt ein Hai geflogen
  • Angriff der Fische!
  • Retter der Meere
  • Der kleine Meerjungmann
de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie die zwei Aquariumswächter mit einem Hai.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SLEEPWITHFISH_DESC: • Beseitigen Sie Robert Knox in einem Aquarium.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Werfen Sie 3 Fische in die Aquarien unter dem Boden.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie den Mann aus Florida mit dem größeren Fisch.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Schlagen Sie Robert Knox mit einem Fisch k. o.
  • Schlagen Sie Sierra Knox mit einem Fisch k. o.

es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa todos los desafíos de Entre peces anda el juego:
  • El pez gordo
  • Tiburones vienen y van
  • Pez letal
  • Salvador acuático
  • El sirenito
es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SHARKFROMABOVE_DESC: • Elimina a los dos guardias del acuario con un tiburón.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_SLEEPWITHFISH_DESC: • Deshazte del cuerpo de Robert Knox en un acuario.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_MOVEFISH_DESC: • Lanza 3 peces a los acuarios que están bajo el suelo.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_BIGGERFISH_DESC: • Elimina a Florida Man con el pez más grande.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_HELIUM_FISHATTACK_DESC:
• Noquea a Robert Knox con un pez.
  • Noquea a Sierra Knox con un pez.
